snippet.text: <record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:model_name}_form_inherit"> <field name="name">${2:model.name}.form.inherit</field> <field name="model">${2}</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="${3:module.view_id}"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="${4:field_name}" position="${5:replace/after/before}"> <xpath expr="${4:field_name}" position="${5:replace/after/before}"> $0 </xpath> </field> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:model_name}_form"> <field name="name">${2:model.name}.form</field> <field name="model">${2}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="${3:String}" version="7.0"> <sheet> <group col="4" colspan="4"> $0 </group> <sheet> </form> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:model_name}_search"> <field name="name">${2:model.name}.search</field> <field name="model">${2:model.name}</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search string="${3:String}" version="7.0"> <search string="${3:String}"> <field name="partner_id" filter_domain="[('partner_id','=',self)]"/> <filter name="state" string="Draft state" domain="[('state','=','draft')]"/> <group expand="0" string="Group By"> <filter name="group_partner" string="Partner" context="{'group_by': 'partner_id'}"/> <filter string="Status" context="{'group_by': 'state'}" icon="terp-stock_effects-object-colorize"/> </group> </search> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:model_name}_tree"> <field name="name">${2:model.name}.tree</field> <field name="model">${2}</field> <field name="type">form</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="${3:String}" editable="${1:top/bottom}" color="${1:grey}:${2:state}=='${3:cancel}';${4:grey}:${5:state}=='${6:cancel}'"> <field name="name"$0 /> </tree> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:model_name}_gantt"> <field name="name">${2:model.name}.gantt</field> <field name="model">${2:model.name}</field> <field name="priority" eval="10"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <gantt color="${3:field_id}" date_delay="${4:date_field}" date_start="${5:date_field}" string="${6:Untitled}"> <level object="${2:model.name}" link="${7:field}_id" domain="[]"> <field name="${8:name}"/> </level> </gantt> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:openerp_model}_graph"> <field name="name">${2:openerp.model}.graph</field> <field name="model">${2:openerp.model}</field> <field name="type">graph</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <graph string="${3:Untitled}" type="${4:bar/pie}"> <field name="${5:field_id}"/> <field name="${6:field}" operator="+"/> </graph> </field> </record>

<record model="ir.ui.view" id="view_${1:model_name}_calendar"> <field name="name">${2:model.name}.calendar</field> <field name="model">${2:model.name}</field> <field name="type">calendar</field> <field name="priority" eval="10"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <calendar color="${3:field_id}" date_delay="${4:date_field}" date_start="${5:date_field}" string="${6:Untitled}"> <field name="${7:name}"/>$0 </calendar> </field> </record>
confirm="${1:Are you sure to confirm this record.}"$0

<record model="ir.actions.act_window" id="action_${1:open_view}_form"> <field name="name">${2:Untitled}</field> <field name="res_model">${3:openerp.model}</field> <field name="view_type">form</field> <field name="view_mode">tree,form</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_${4:model_name}_form"/> <field name="context">{}</field> <field name="domain">[]</field> </record>

<act_window domain="[('${1:field_id}', '=', active_id)]" id="act_${2:openerp_model}_2_${3:openerp_model}" name="${4:Untitle}" res_model="${5:openerp.model}" src_model="${6:openerp.model}" view_mode="${7:tree,form,calendar,graph}" view_type="form"/>
